column2: We are seeking an experienced Test lead with a minimum of 8 years of hands-on experience in test automation. The ideal candidate should be proficient in test automation and have a deep understanding of software testing methodologies, test automation best practices, and a strong commitment to high-quality         ?       Duties/Responsibilities         Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable automated test scripts for UI and API testing using modern tools and technologies.         Expertise in Selenium with TestNG/Junit, Cypress, or Playwright and API test automation using tools like Ready API, Rest Assured or Postman.         Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline and lead the implementation of Shift Left .         Collaborate closely with software developers and product managers to understand system requirements and ensure comprehensive test coverage working with quality engineers.         Contribute to the development of test strategies, test plans, and test cases based on project requirements.         Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of Test automation practices within the team and evaluate team performance based on the same.         Education and Experience         bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, or related field.         8+ years of experience in software development or software testing, with a focus on test automation.         Strong proficiency in UI test automation using Selenium, Cypress, Playwright or any other modern test tools.         Demonstrated experience in automated API testing using tools like Ready API, Rest Assured or Postman.         Experience working with AWS Services including but not limited to AWS Lambda, AWS EC2, and AWS S3. Provision and manage test environments using AWS cloud formation, and containerization will be a plus.         Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript.         Experience with Git/bitbucket and CI/CD tools like Jenkins/Github actions/circle CI.         Strong communication and collaboration skills

column2: We are looking for a skilled QA Lead with expertise in both Automation Testing and Manual Testing to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in leading QA teams, developing test strategies, and ensuring the quality of our software products.         Roles and Responsibility:         Lead the QA team and oversee all aspects of the quality assurance process.     Develop and implement test strategies, test plans, test cases, and test scripts.     Conduct both manual and automated testing to ensure software quality.     Collaborate with the development team to identify and resolve defects.     Review and analyze system specifications.     Coordinate with the project management team to prioritize testing efforts.     Provide feedback and recommendations to improve software quality.     Mentor and train QA team members on best practices and new technologies.     Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in quality assurance.         Requirements :         Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.     8+ years of experience in QA, with a focus on both Automation and Manual Testing.     Proven experience leading QA teams and managing projects.     Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes.     Experience with test automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, or similar.     Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C#.     Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.     Strong communication and leadership abilities.     Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment is a plus.

column2: We are looking for a Senior Functional QA who will involve in Triage and create end- to-end test plans, execute the plans, and manage all activities in the plan to ensure that all the objectives are met, and that the solution works as expected. The solution should be tested in terms of functionality, performance, reliability, stability, and compatibility with other systems.       Role and Responsibilities        Review functional and design specifications to ensure full understanding of individual deliverables.     Identify test requirements from specifications, map test case requirements and design test coverage plan.     Develop, document, and maintain functional test cases and other te5t artifacts like the test data, data validation, QA reports.     Create/Execute and evaluate Manual or Automated test cases and report test results.     Hold and facilitate test plan/case reviews with cross-functional team members.     Identify any potential quality issues per defined process and escalate potential.     quality issues immediately to management.     Ensure that validated deliverables meet functional and design specifications and requirements.     Isolate, replicate, and report defects and verify defect fixes.         Preferred Qualifications      5+ years of hands-on QA testing experience in a client and/or web service environment, while adhering to Agile methodologies     Minimum 4+ years of experience performing manual testing.     Proficiency with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery     Comfortable with databases and SQL     Writing clear, concise detail-oriented test plans/cases     Ability to create a test strategy that will encompass a complete QA effort     Ability to understand and create test plans from specifications or verbal communications, should be able to communicate and work with US based enterprise clients/cross geographical internal stakeholders.     Experience with responsive and adaptive design     Experience with and should have good knowledge in any of the test management tools like Spira, ALM, Rally, Atlassian tools - JIRA, Confluence,     Bitbucket     Liaison with development, project management, and client                     Nice-to-Have s:        Knowledge around E-commerce space is a strong plus     Experience writing automated test scripts for functional tests     Hands-on Experience in Load testing     Experience with CI/CD tools     Expertise in Accessibility testing.

column2: You will be responsible for recruiting top talent, establishing a positive, innovative and productive culture and delivering high quality software to our customers.      In this role you will manage a group of software QA engineers working in an agile environment. This is a hands-on role requiring a strong technical background, the ability to enhance customer quality and keep the product lifecycle on track.     This position is both people management and technical contribution to the Endpoint product within Forcepoint.     This is a fantastic opportunity for an experienced manager to work with a strong team in developing the latest features for a market leading company in data protection.         Essential Functions:         Develop compatibility and performance test plans, test cases, and test automation for Forcepoint s endpoint security agents.     Work directly with software engineers both locally and globally to ensure product quality objectives are achieved     Configures workstations, operating environments, and the system under test, as needed to complete assigned testing.     Manage the compatibility lab with 3rd party products.     Setup and maintain test labs for various projects.     Conduct concurrency testing and automate these tests.     Develop and maintain automated testing workflows for compatibility deliverables.     Implement performance testing, including function profiling, stress testing, soak testing, etc     Coordinate with 3rd party vendors for product compatibility testing.         Preferred Technical Skills:         5+ years of experience with Python on MacOS or Windows.     Expert Python coder with experience in developing and maintaining automation solutions.     Experience with performance tools such as JMeter, LoadRunner, or Apache Bench.     Knowledge of compatibility tools for cross-component based and cross-platform testing.     Experience working in a fast-paced, agile environment with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD).     Experience with Virtualization tools such as VMWare, parallels etc     Strong experience with Cloud Infrastructure technology like Azure and AWS.     Experience with source control systems like Git.     Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with developers, escalation group and other team members.     Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.     Experience in measuring and reporting quality-related metrics to identify trends and proactively solve problems.     ISTQB certifications are a plus but not mandatory.         Soft Skills:         Proven in the art of making good impactful decisions.     Ability to articulate a clear guidance and vision.     Strong communication (written and oral) and teamwork behavior within a diverse team environment.     Ability to build good working relationships with other teams around the world.     Ability to create an innovative, collaborative, and supportive culture.     Strong focus on reports talent development and career growth.     Self-motivated to research new skills and technologies.     Commitment to the broader range of product development goals.         Education and Experience:         bachelors degree or equivalent experience.     Extensive experience managing a QA engineering team.     Strong troubleshooting skills, good coding, and source management practices.     Experience managing multiple teams.

column2: Project Role : Test Automation Lead Project Role Description : Lead the transformation of testing into a continuous and efficient end-to-end quality engineering function through the use of quality processes, tools, and methodologies significantly improving control, accuracy and integrity. Must have skills : Micro Focus LoadRunner Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 year of full time education Summary :As a Test Automation Lead, you will be responsible for leading the transformation of testing into a continuous and efficient end-to-end quality engineering function through the use of quality processes, tools, and methodologies. Your typical day will involve evolving more predictive and intelligent testing approaches based on automation and innovative testing products and solutions using Micro Focus LoadRunner. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize testing requirements, ensuring that testing is integrated into the development process. Strong understanding of software testing methodologies, including functional, regression, performance, and security testing. Experience with test automation frameworks and tools, including scripting languages such as Python and Java. Experience with Agile development methodologies and tools such as JIRA and Confluence. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Micro Focus LoadRunner. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering high-quality testing solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification 15 year of full time education

column2: Role Description As a QA Automation Engineer, ensure the conformance to business specification with reliable and performant and Secure software product. Performance testing, benchmarking and reporting around the same Play a role of cross functional QA who along with automation, can also contribute/aid towards exploratory testing, system testing and be conversant with analysis tools/skills such as splunks, SQL analysis, examining message queues etc. Play a role of cross functional QA who contributes by thinking about deficiencies in product, processes and demand for a better outcome with specific inputs Your key responsibilities  Provide inputs to Enterprise and domain level Test Automation Strategy and roadmap Takes ownership of strategy and solution design, development and implementation in specific system areas, such as, Cloud, Continuous Delivery and Test Behaviour Driven Development Design, Develop and Implement test automation frameworks and reusable components for various platforms and technologies Mentor junior team members on test automation best practices. Hands-on contribution to test automation frameworks and application level test automation. Provide technical guidance to a team of Test Automation Analysts to ensure high quality automation deliverable. Your skills and experience Relevant Experience (Test Automation) : Preferably same or we're fine with below relevant experience. AVP - 8-10 years Should have experience on: Test Automation framework development or framework enhancement.Were specifically looking for a resource who has actively contributed to either framework development or enhancement. Not that resource who just executed the test suite with the help of framework. Java, Python, JavaScript Typescript. API Testing Should have worked on BDD. Selenium Webdriver. UI Automation -: WebdriverIO Karate for Angular apps automation . Strong SQL knowledge. Good knowledge of Unix commands. Should be able to provide solution on complex regarding test automation issues. Keen on research on different technologies regarding test automation. Below are some expectations from AVP... People management capabilities. Handling deliveries under pressure. Managing multiple deliveries at the same time.

column2: Brightly continues to grow and needs amazing engineers. This is an excellent fit for talented engineers who thrive in a fast-paced environment.      New hires will work alongside our top-notch engineers and product team to design, implement, deliver, and support our highly ambitious products and integrations.      We care deeply about your passion and dedication to the craft of software.     The Automation Test Architect supports the application platforms in the Engineering department. This is a great opportunity for a talented Test Architect to bring their experience, business acumen, and architectural philosophies to the forefront of the day-to-day management of our projects and sprint         What you'll be doing       - Drive the quality deliverables and be the voice of quality.     - Supporting the Test Engineering with their strategic goals for the Test Team by providing technical support.     - Determine which tools and technologies can be deployed, keeping in mind what is already in use throughout the development function and the team s skill set.     - Take charge of test infrastructure, including environments and software, and collaborate with teams like DevOps and Support on CI/CD.     - To test and other business functions, provide technical know-how, documentation, and training.     - Keep up with new process, practice, and technology advances so that they may be adopted in-house and used to improve the testing solutions.     - Creating and maintaining TA frameworks, TA solutions or other shared formats which can be used by all/many projects & programs with TA across a company      - Having TA expertise enough to be placed into any problematic, slow performing TA solution to identify and solve issues - with code, vendor alignment, testability issues, requirement issues, environment, or data issues etc      - Identifying the best-fit languages, TA frameworks, TA tools, data input and output methods/types for a project or program TA solution     - Establish design principles for QA automation and Performance Testing Present options and recommendations as needed.       Be part of continuous improvement processes. Welcome, change and complexity. Learn quickly and adapt fast. Be a change leader!     Differentiate between immediate needs vs long-term solutions.     Provide technical guidance to test team     Collaborate in product lifecycle with senior engineers, development managers, product managers, scrum-masters in an agile environment, with scrum implemented at scale globally.         Requirements         bachelors in computer science or related discipline     Guide & develop automation framework developments     Jenkins & similar tools for Continuous Integration     Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.     Strong ability to understand technical product architecture     Own product quality     Must have a very good understanding of Testing concepts and terminologies     Proven ability to effectively share knowledge and stay aware of current trends and technical advancements     Experience leading small to mid-sized teams is a plus     Working knowledge of agile methodologies     Strong communication, partnership, mentoring, team player         Nice to have:         Experience with AWS or any other cloud platform     Open-Source contribution, repositories, personal projects     Participation in communities of interest, meetups     Certifications in technology, agile methodologies

column2: Define and implement automation test processes, strategies and approaches for complex test requirements. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and translate them into comprehensive test plans and test cases. Possess hands on experience on multiple open source/commercial tools (Selenium, C#, Rest Sharp, Spec Flow, BDD, Coded UI, etc.), web testing, frameworks and infrastructures for automation. Define test assessment strategies for client project requirements. Analyse various products and technologies and develop POCs for demo purpose. Be creative and proactive thinker and make use of current technologies to provide extensible automation infrastructures. Should review product requirements, functional and design specifications to determine and prepare automated test cases. Should have experience working directly with customer and working with CoEs. Hands on Experience in designing various Automation Framework like Functional Decomposition, JavaScript/Java based, Cucumber, Selenium Frameworks Utilizing - TDD, BDD with wrappers/helper/accelerators. Perform API testing to validate the integration and functionality of backend services. Identify, Document & Track software defects and issues, ensuring they are resolved in a timely manner. Utilise automation testing frameworks and tools to streamline and automate the testing process. Design and develop automated test scripts for regression testing, API testing. Monitor and maintain test environments, ensuring they are properly configured and represent the live/cloud environments. Collaborate with the development team to ensure that software defects are properly prioritized and resolved. Provide clear and concise reports on test results and overall software quality to stakeholders. Stay updated with industry best practices and emerging trends in software testing and quality assurance, particularly in the areas API testing, & automation testing.   Desired Skills and Experience   At least 8 years of IT experience with 5+ years in Test Automation. Strong understanding of software testing methodologies, techniques, and best practices. Experience in manual and automated testing, including the use of testing tools and frameworks. Familiarity with testing frameworks and tools. Knowledge of API testing tools, such as Postman or SoapUI. Proficiency in automation testing frameworks and tools, such as Selenium, Cypress, or similar. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with meticulous attention to detail. Excellent communication and collaboration abilities. Experience of using tools to support planning and tracking of timeboxed or agile approaches. Ability to provide clear technical leadership whilst working collaboratively with a wider solution and bid team. Strong problem-solving with the ability to work cross-functionally in a fast-paced and rapidly changing work environment. Strategic thinker, coupled with an output focused approach to getting the job done - particularly in a bid scenario. Quick learner with an in-depth understanding of the capability.

column2: Job Summary:  As an Automation Architect, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing automation solutions to enhance the efficiency, reliability, and quality of software development and testing processes. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams, defining automation strategies, and leveraging automation tools and frameworks to drive automation excellence. He must have 12 + years of hands-on experience in Web, Mobile and API automation using tools like Selenium/Cypress or Playwright, Appium and RestAssured with Java. He should have expertise in developing automation framework, automation strategy, RFP support, working on POCs and client presentations. Responsibilities: Automation Strategy and Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to define automation strategies, goals, and objectives aligned with business and project requirements. Develop automation roadmaps and implementation plans for achieving automation goals. To perform automation assessment and create an automation roadmap. Work with project teams to prioritize and address high-risk areas. Automation Framework Design: Should be able to work as an Individual contributor. Design and architect scalable and maintainable automation frameworks tailored to project needs and technologies. Select appropriate automation tools, libraries, and technologies to support automation initiatives. Tool Evaluation and Adoption: Evaluate and recommend automation tools, software, and technologies to improve testing and development efficiency. Lead the adoption and integration of automation tools into existing workflows and processes. Test Automation Development: Develop and maintain automated test scripts and suites using scripting languages (e.g. Java, JavaScript, etc.) and automation tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, Cypress). Ensure test scripts are reusable, modular, and maintainable to support continuous testing practices. Integration and CI/CD: Integrate automated tests into continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for seamless testing and deployment. Collaborate with DevOps teams to automate testing in deployment pipelines and environments. Quality Assurance Practices: Define and enforce automation coding standards, best practices, and guidelines. Conduct code reviews, test code coverage analysis, and performance testing to ensure quality and reliability of automation solutions. Define and enforce quality assurance standards and guidelines Training and Knowledge Sharing: Provide training, mentorship, and guidance to automation engineers and testing teams on automation techniques, tools, and practices. Foster a culture of automation excellence and knowledge sharing within the organization. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement, optimization, and automation enhancement. Implement automation initiatives and innovations to drive continuous improvement and efficiency gains

column2: Brightly continues to grow and needs amazing engineers. This is an excellent fit for talented engineers who thrive in a fast-paced environment. New hires will work alongside our top-notch engineers and product team to design, implement, deliver, and support our highly ambitious products and integrations. This is a great opportunity for a talented Test Architect to bring their experience, business acumen, and architectural philosophies to the forefront of the day-to-day management of our projects and sprint         What you ll be doing       ?     Drive the quality deliverables and be the voice of quality.     - Supporting the Test Engineering with their strategic goals for the Test Team by providing technical support.     - Determine which tools and technologies can be deployed, keeping in mind what is already in use throughout the development function and the team s skill set.     - Take charge of test infrastructure, including environments and software, and collaborate with teams like DevOps and Support on CI/CD.     - To test and other business functions, provide technical know-how, documentation, and training.     - Keep up with new process, practice, and technology advances so that they may be adopted in-house and used to improve the testing solutions.     - Creating and maintaining TA frameworks, TA solutions or other shared formats which can be used by all/many projects programs with TA across a company      - Having TA expertise enough to be placed into any problematic, slow performing TA solution to identify and solve issues - with code, vendor alignment, testability issues, requirement issues, environment, or data issues etc.      - Identifying the best-fit languages, TA frameworks, TA tools, data input and output methods/types for a project or program TA solution     - Establish design principles for QA automation and Performance Testing Present options and recommendations as needed. column2: A strong battle-tested QA Automation Engineer and has experience working with Test Automation frameworks (eg, Selenium, Cucumber, Robot, Appium, Junit, PyTest, etc)          We are seeking a highly skilled Quality Engineer Automation Tester with a specialization in Data Testing to join our team.          The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in data-intensive environments, particularly in batch-process/ETL oriented systems.          Your primary focus will be on ensuring the quality and reliability of data pipelines, ETL processes, and data-intensive applications.         ?You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and execute automated test scripts, ensuring the integrity and accuracy of our data-centric systems.(e. g. - ETL Talend, Hadoop, PySpark, Pl/ Sql etc)             Years of experience needed -                 6+ years of experience working as a Test Engineer or similar role             6+ years of experience working with Test Automation frameworks (eg, Selenium, Cucumber, Robot, Appium, Junit, PyTest, etc)              Data-centric Testing experience (e. g. - ETL Talend, Hadoop, PySpark, Pl/ Sql etc)             Technical Skills:                 6+ years of experience working as a Test Engineer or similar role             6+ years of experience working with Test Automation frameworks (eg, Selenium, Cucumber, Robot, Appium, Junit, PyTest, etc)              Hands-on experience building/extending Test Automation frameworks              Good to have experience with databases/SQL to extract, load, manipulate and analyze complex data to identify patterns/trends and draw conclusions              Good to have experience with web service technologies (eg, XML, REST, SOAP)              Good to have 2+ years of experience with Java, Python or JavaScript development (intermediate - advanced level)              Experience with BDD or TDD              Automated Testing: Develop and execute automated test scripts using appropriate tools and frameworks (eg, PySpark, Scala+Spark) to validate data processing pipelines, ETL workflows, and batch-oriented systems.             Data Validation: Implement comprehensive testing strategies to validate data accuracy, completeness, and integrity across various stages of data processing, including extraction, transformation, and loading.             Documentation: Maintain detailed documentation of test plans, test cases, and test results. Communicate findings, defects, and testing progress effectively to stakeholders.             Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams including developers, data engineers, business analysts, and stakeholders to ensure alignment on testing objectives and priorities.             Bachelors degree in engineering, computer science, computer engineering, or equivalent work experience

Applies testing methodologies, principles and processes to define and implement key metrics to manage and assess the testing process including test execution and defect resolution.  Must have skills : Selenium Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Minimum 16 years of full time education Summary :As a Quality Engineering Lead (Test Lead), you will be responsible for leading a team of quality engineers through multi-disciplinary team planning and ecosystem integration to accelerate delivery and drive quality across the application lifecycle. Your typical day will involve applying business and functional knowledge to develop end-to-end testing strategies through the use of quality processes and methodologies, and defining and implementing key metrics to manage and assess the testing process including test execution and defect resolution.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead a team of quality engineers through multi-disciplinary team planning and ecosystem integration to accelerate delivery and drive quality across the application lifecycle. Develop end-to-end testing strategies through the use of quality processes and methodologies. Define and implement key metrics to manage and assess the testing process including test execution and defect resolution. Apply testing methodologies, principles and processes to ensure high quality of the product. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely delivery of high-quality products. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Selenium. Good To Have Skills:Experience in automation testing tools like Appium, TestNG, JUnit, and Cucumber. Strong understanding of testing methodologies, principles, and processes. Experience in defining and implementing key metrics to manage and assess the testing process including test execution and defect resolution. Experience in leading a team of quality engineers through multi-disciplinary team planning and ecosystem integration to accelerate delivery and drive quality across the application lifecycle. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Selenium. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering high-quality products. This position is based at our Pune office. Qualification Minimum 16 years of full time education

column1: Automation QA - QE Consolidation and Transformation - Offshore - RFP
column2: Automation QA - QE Consolidation and Transformation - Offshore - RFP (Originations)(8) About the Role: QE Automation is seeking a skilled and experienced individual to join our team as a QE Automation. The successful candidate will be responsible for analyzing requirements, defining test strategies and scenarios, preparing test cases, executing test scripts, and reporting on test results. They will also be responsible for defect tracking and reporting, as well as regression testing. The QE Automation will work closely with the Test Lead and Test Manager to ensure the quality of our applications. Job Title: QE Automation Responsibilities:  Analyze the requirements from BRD & FSD.  Identify and define the required test strategy, test scenarios, and associated test data.  Prepare test cases based on user stories.  Prepare and extract test data for the test cases.  Review test cases with business and other team members.  Execute test cases on Test Foundation Server (TFS).  Use programming concepts, including knowledge in Java, Dot net, and C#.  Use automation frameworks.  Use QA Automation Tool  UiPath.  Create and execute automated test scripts based on test cases.  Track and report defects.  Prepare daily status reports and QA summary reports.  Evaluate the outcome of each test cycle and provide test results.  Prepare suggestion documents to improve application quality.  Communicate with the Test Lead/Test Manager.  Involved in regression testing and submit regression testing reports. Required Skills:  3+ years of experience in all phases of software testing, including automation testing, web and database testing with SQL.  Knowledge of DevOps from a testing perspective.  In depth knowledge of SQL.  Experience with Test & Defect Management Tools  TFS & JIRA.  Good understanding of BFS business.  Complete knowledge of UAT and E2E testing.  Flexibility to work in functional testing. Desirable Skills:  Experience with UI automation from upstream data creation. Education Qualification:  Not specified.
column11: UiPath, C#, Java, Dot net, Defect Management Tools, QA Automation

column2: As a QA Lead, your role is to oversee the quality assurance process within a team or organization     You are responsible for ensuring that software products or services meet the required standards and customer expectations     Here are some key responsibilities and tasks typically associated with the role of a QA Lead:Test Planning: You collaborate with project managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define test objectives, strategies, and test plans     This involves understanding project requirements, creating test cases, and identifying the scope of testing     Test Execution: You coordinate and execute test cases, ensuring that they are conducted accurately and efficiently     This may involve manual testing as well as the use of automated testing tools     You monitor test progress, track defects, and provide feedback to the development team     Test Management: You oversee the entire testing process, including test environment setup, test data management, and test execution scheduling     You ensure that testing activities are properly organized and prioritized to meet project timelines     Defect Management: You lead the defect tracking and management process     This includes identifying, documenting, and tracking defects found during testing     You work closely with developers to analyze and resolve issues, ensuring that all identified defects are appropriately addressed     Team Leadership: As a QA Lead, you provide guidance and support to the QA team members     You assign tasks, monitor their progress, and offer mentorship and training as needed     You foster a collaborative and productive work environment and promote a culture of quality within the team     Process Improvement: You continuously evaluate and improve the testing process, methodologies, and tools     You identify areas for improvement and implement best practices to enhance efficiency and effectiveness     You may also conduct reviews and audits to ensure adherence to quality standards

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled QA Architect with extensive experience in SaaS product environments        The ideal candidate will possess a comprehensive understanding of Mobile QA, Cloud technologies (specifically AWS), Performance Testing, Security Testing, and Automation (both mobile and web)      The role requires a minimum of 12 years of hands-on experience in SaaS product companies, demonstrating expertise in designing, implementing, and executing robust quality assurance strategies                             How You Will Make an Impact:                                    Develop and implement comprehensive QA strategies for SaaS products, ensuring the highest standards of quality throughout the development lifecycle.                                  Architect and design test frameworks, methodologies, and processes that cover Mobile QA, Cloud (AWS), Performance Testing, Security Testing, and Automation for mobile and web applications.                                  Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including development, product management, and operations to define quality standards, best practices, and testing requirements.                                  Lead and mentor QA teams to drive efficiency, consistency, and innovation in testing approaches.                                  Conduct Performance Testing and benchmarking activities to identify bottlenecks, optimize system performance, and ensure scalability.                                  Execute security testing protocols to identify vulnerabilities, assess risks, and implement measures to fortify product security.                                  Develop, maintain, and enhance automated test suites for both mobile and web applications to ensure continuous testing coverage.                                  Stay updated with the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies related to QA, recommending and implementing improvements to existing processes.                                    What You Bring to the Team:                                  To be successful in this role, we believe that you need to possess the following attributes.                                    Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field; advanced degree preferred.                                  Minimum of 12 years of progressive experience in quality assurance roles within SaaS or product companies.                                  Expertise in Mobile QA with a focus on Offline First experience, Cloud technologies (especially AWS), Performance Testing, Security Testing, and Automation.                                  Proven track record of architecting and implementing QA strategies for complex, scalable software products.                                  Proficiency in various testing tools and frameworks such as Selenium, Appium, JMeter, etc.                                  Strong understanding of Agile methodologies and experience working in Agile/Scrum environments.                                  Exceptional analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.                                  Leadership abilities with experience in mentoring and guiding QA teams.                                    What We Offer above work:                                    A positive, open, and highly-innovative environment and team.                                  Entrepreneurial spirit with unlimited opportunity to grow.                                  Opportunity to work with leading global brands on exciting and impactful projects.                                  Competitive Base Pay.                                  Best of plan on Vacation & Paid Time Off.                                  Provision of Medical Insurance for family - self, dependent, spouse, dependent children,                                                          parents/parent-in-laws.                                  Paid Maternity and Paternity leave.                                  Bi-annual reviews to ensure transparency and promote high performance culture.                                  OKR Driven Performance Development Environment.                                  Learning & Development - access to a wide range of e-Learning courses (technical,                                                          Product, Process, etc.,).                                  A host of Interest Groups/Clubs for Book Reading, Toastmasters, Sports - Cricket,                                                          Volleyball, Throw-ball, Badminton, TT, Music.

column2: We help our customers free up time and space to become an Autonomous Digital Enterprise that conquers the opportunities ahead - and are relentless in the pursuit of innovation! BMC is hiring Lead SQA Engineers who have Get it done and "Do it Right" attitude and should be thriving for the quality, diligence, and thoroughness. The role requires experience of product development life cycle with high quality using various tools and processes. Understanding requirements of complex use cases of SaaS solutions, manage upgrades, automation, dev-ops and Site reliability engineering is a must have.  BMC is looking for a QA Tech Lead to join a QE team working on complex and distributed software, developing test plans, executing tests, developing automation & assuring product quality.  Here is how, through this exciting role, YOU will contribute to BMC's and your own success: Take overall responsibility of the product quality, put checks, control and propose and implement processes to prevent regression, defect leaks to customers.  Collaborate with dev, PMs and other QA to come up with solid test strategy and test cases to cover end to end use cases for any features or enhancements.  Automate new test cases and maintain existing ones with high quality and ensuring all automated cases are part of continuous regression and runs on nightly builds with no/minimal maintenance  Should be able to identify room for improvements for making automation more efficient and stable.  Review SDD, test features, document and test upgrade scenarios, identification of breaking changes.  Work with other product solution teams to ensure integration, upgrades and dependencies for every release and patches are well understood and planned.  Mentor other quality and automation engineers to review the automation, test cases and contribute to overall product quality.  Participate in agile development processes and events like release planning and iteration planning, scrum meetings, retrospectives meetings.  Assumes overall responsibility for projects in designated areas in terms of functionality, quality, efficiency, and timeliness.  Have an attitude of ownership, and exhibit leadership and be able to drive things to GET IT DONE.  To ensure youre set up for success, you will bring the following skillset & experience:  12+ Years of hands-on Software Quality Assurance experience in software product development 5+ Years of hands-on test cases automation development experience in developing and implementing automated testing platforms using Selenium & Java from scratch. Managing automation frameworks and run regression suites. Hands on experience with tools like Selenium, Java, Code Collaborator Good understanding on code coverage tools Must have worked on large scale enterprise products (n-tier architecture) Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application Experienced in working with Agile development methodology and working with virtual team. Experience with CI/CD using Jenkins and related scripting to implement continuous testing. Strong knowledge and hands on experience with container-based apps on Kubernetes, and OpenShift. Experience of creating and maintain helm charts for deployments is a must. Experience with at least one cloud platform like AWS, Azure, OCI or GCI. Whilst these are nice to have, our team can help you develop in the following skills:  Test Automation experience, Scripting skills (preferably Robot Framework, Python etc.) Performance testing (Scalability, benchmarking, Load) frameworks, such as JMeter, etc.  Agile methodology  Jenkins CI
column11: SQA, Jenkins, Java, Azure, OCI, Agile development, CI/CD, Robot Framework, Selenium, GCI, JMeter, AWS

column2: Youre a passionate Senior Software Tester / Test Architect with a proven track record in software testing who wants to have the opportunity to contribute to groundbreaking projects that directly impact patient care and drive advancements in the medical field.         In this role, you are responsible to             Collaborate closely with cross-functional, agile development teams to design and implement effective testing processes for an existing imaging system, based on Syngo classic.         Plan and manage execution of test plans, test cases, and test scripts to validate software functionality.         Execute manual and automated tests to identify defects and ensure software quality.         Lead the design and implementation of test automation frameworks and tools.         Conduct performance, scalability, and security testing as required.         Analyze and document test results and provide clear feedback to development teams for continuous improvement.         Identify and report software defects in a detailed and concise manner.         Mentor and guide junior testers, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and growth.         Stay up-to-date with trends and best practices in software testing.         To be successful in this role, your profile includes:             Graduation or Post Graduation in Computer Science / Information Technology / Medical or Life Sciences.          7+ years of experience in software testing and quality assurance.         Strong knowledge of testing methodologies, architectures and best practices.         Proficiency in test automation tools and frameworks.         Knowledge of frameworks for medical products like syngo classic is highly preferred.         Experience in R&D organizations and agile setups like SAFe/SCRUM is preferred.         Knowledge of software development life cycle and software engineering processes of medical products         Software development experience in C++ is highly welcome.         Expertise in MS Visual Studio, Azure DevOps, source control systems like ClearCase or GIT, requirement management systems (e.g. Caliber, Requisite Pro) and test automation frameworks         Demonstrated ability working with multi-cultural teams and various internal (R&D, legal, procurement, export control and customs) and external stakeholders globally.         Excellent verbal and written communication skills, business fluency in English.         Proven coordination & influencing skills, and ability to lead without authority. Should have a bias towards action.         Able to multi-task, work under pressure and manage multiple project activities and responsibilities effectively.         Should be self-motivated and assertive.

column2: The QA Automation Architect is responsible for leading the design, development and implementation of automated testing solutions across all lines of business.         This role involves working closely with development and quality assurance teams to analyze the application landscape, delivery approach, and strategic initiatives to devise an appropriate test automation strategy and approach.         Evaluate and select appropriate tools and technologies for test automation, ensuring alignment with project requirements and industry best practices.         Define and enforce coding standards, guidelines and best practices for automation scripts ensuring consistency across the automation framework.         Provide technical leadership and mentorship to QA engineers across different value teams and guide them in the creation and maintenance of automated test suites.         Collaborate with DevOps teams to integrate tests seamlessly into the CI/CD pipeline.         Conduct regular reviews of automated test scripts and frameworks to identify areas of improvement and optimization.          Overseeing framework updates and enhancements through monthly open house sessions with QA community, fostering ideation and exploring solutions to ensure a robust and efficient automation ecosystem.         The QA Automation Architect should stay informed about the industry trends and advancements in test methodologies to continually enhance the automation strategy and maintain a high standard of QA practices.               Technical / Functional Skills               Hands on experience in building, scaling, migrating, and maintaining automation frameworks. column2: Act as a test manager / test architect, owning the testing activities for one or more projects running on web and mobile platforms.         Define custom test strategy based on the business and system requirements to improve the product quality through best practices like early testing, continuous testing etc so that the project timelines can be met without compromising on quality.         Responsible for certifying the product quality from a functional, performance and security testing context.         Perform test planning, team coordination as well as ensuring testing process compliance through different monitoring measures.         Work in close liaison with the project manager and the customer for communications related to the testing activities.         Work with the testing team to lay out the approach so that the stories are tested as soon as the development is complete, so that only minimal defects get leaked to the test environment.         Monitor the project from process and quality standpoint and alert the project manager about the deviations/risks at the earliest.         Participate in customer calls, the requirement gathering exercises, sprint planning / grooming sessions, sprint review etc as needed.         Guide and mentor, the testing team in implementing best practices in different areas of testing including System testing, Regression testing (including automation), Performance Testing, Security Testing etc         Track the team s performance systematically through quality metrics and take measures to improve it.         Contribute to generate documentation showcasing the team s capabilities in winning new opportunities.         Contribute to pre-sales activities by taking part in responding to RFPs from testing/quality assurance context.         Job Specification / Skills and Competencies         Act as a test manager / test architect for one or more projects running on Web and Mobile platforms.         Define test strategy and test approach to meet the project timelines without compromising on quality.         Perform test planning activities for each sprint and ensure the team can complete testing as per the test strategy defined.         Create and maintain Impact Matrix for every user story in scope.         Monitor that the defined test approach is followed, and the tasks are completed as planned in the sprint. Raise any risks encountered.         Encourage the testers to collaborate with the rest of the team and the stories get tested as soon as the development is complete.         Certify that the features getting delivered meet the quality expectations from the functional, performance and security testing aspects.         Perform test reporting like test progress report, summary report, quality metrics etc and keep the project team posted on how each sprint is progressing.         Ensure the team understands the process guidelines so that they can follow it as intended.         Do periodic review of the testing process followed and the deliverables created. Suggest process improvements needed, if any.         Identify and implement technical innovations that add value and improve the engineering processes.         Guide and mentor, the team to learn new tools, upskill themselves in Test Automation, Per and follow best practices in the industry.         Frequently connect with the testing team and support them in addressing any concerns or issues that they are facing in the project.         Take part in pre-sales activities such as creating testing related materials, support in proposal submission etc         To adhere to the Information Security Management policies and procedures.         Any Additional Information/Specifics         The candidate should have excellent communication skills, strong interpersonal skills and be team oriented.         Innovative in proposing/implementing new ideas/processes.         Highly motivated and self-starting, should have proactive approach to resolving issues and working with limited supervision.         Ability to quickly learn new testing tools/technology and implement it effectively.
column11: Engineering services, System testing, Product engineering, Test strategy, Testing tools, Functional testing, Performance testing, Security testing, Regression testing, Monitoring

column2: As a QA Lead, you will be responsible for overseeing the quality assurance process and ensuring that our products meet the highest standards of quality and reliability     You will lead a team of QA engineers, define testing strategies, and implement best practices to identify and prevent defects throughout the software development lifecycle           Responsibilities:         Lead and mentor a team of QA engineers, providing guidance and support in all aspects of quality assurance.     Develop and implement QA processes, procedures, and standards to ensure consistency and efficiency.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand product requirements and develop comprehensive test plans.     Design, execute, and automate test cases to validate functionality, performance, and scalability of software applications.     Identify and prioritize areas for test automation, and develop automated test scripts using appropriate tools and frameworks.     Establish and maintain test environments and test data sets to support ongoing testing activities.     Monitor and analyze test results, identify defects and track them to resolution using bug tracking systems.     Participate in release planning and deployment activities, ensuring that quality objectives are met for each release.     Conduct root cause analysis of defects and work with development teams to implement corrective and preventive actions.     Stay current with industry trends and best practices in software quality assurance.         Qualifications:         Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.     Proven experience in software quality assurance, including at least 2 years in a leadership role.     Strong understanding of QA methodologies, tools, and processes.     Experience with test automation tools and frameworks (eg, Selenium, Appium, JUnit, TestNG).     Proficiency in programming/scripting languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript.     Familiarity with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines and tools (eg, Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD).     Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail.     Strong communication and leadership skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.     Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies is a plus.     ISTQB or other relevant certifications are desirable but not required.

column1: Senior / Staff / Lead- Developer Documentation Writer
column2: Salesforce is looking for an experienced, talented, and motivated Technical Writer to produce high-quality technical content for developers or DevOps engineers.          You know how to work collaboratively with other writers, an editor, Product Management, Engineering, customers, and others to create the technical topics and examples that customers can find on Google.         Phrases such as topic-based, Google-ready, developer-focused, task-oriented, and component documentation flow naturally whenever you talk about your work.          You are unafraid to ask questions because you love to learn about complex technologies.          If you are a problem-solver who can deliver quality content in a demanding environment under tight deadlines, then this might be the perfect opportunity to take your career to the next level on a small, agile writing team at a fast-growing company.                 3 Months               You understand all of the core use cases for one or more technologies and are able to thoroughly document them.             You are self-directed in working with engineering to gather doc requirements for upcoming releases, proactively responding to technical and editorial feedback about documentation for your focused technology or technologies.             You understand our other technologies well enough to write topics for larger team deliverables and have developed a strong relationship with Engineering to manage successful tech review of new or existing content.               12 Months               You demonstrate expertise in one or more of Salesforces technologies and know how our customers use them.             You have a reputation for writing trusted guidance and have built a strong working relationship with Engineering stakeholders to draft, review, and publish content.             You proactively respond to and seek documentation feedback from internal and external customers, including editorial.             You have evaluated one or more documentation sets, implemented organizational and structural changes, and taken ownership of the process of peer, editorial, and technical reviews of your content.               What you'll Need to be Successful               Ability to read code in Java or a scripting language             Experience documenting APIs, SDKs, and cloud-based enterprise software             Experience with Git, Markdown, and working from the command line              Ability to break down problems into solvable tasks             Exceptionally clear and precise writing skills, with a strong voice and sharp sense of organizational coherence, along with the subject-matter knowledge required for credibility             Strong understanding of agile software development
column11: Product management, GIT, Agile, Manager Technology, Enterprise software, Salesforce
